thread.section_title: Brake Performance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brake Performance | brakeperformance.com
thread.title: Sean Rury
thread.title_full: Brake Performance reviewed by Sean Rury

author: Sean Rury
title: Sean Rury
text:
I have been trying for weeks to get new pads because my last pair were the noisiest things I had ever heard for a set of high performance brakes.
I was able to get some help to get a new set w/ a large discount. Free would have been better, so stay tuned to see how these hold up.
Thanks!
